column4: UPDATE 1-Tesla Fremont factory power to be restored within hours
column5: Aug 14 Power will be restored by Friday afternoon at the Tesla Motors Inc auto factory in Fremont  California  a spokeswoman for utility Pacific Gas & Electric Co said.

column4: Tesla raises share offering to $642.5 million
column5: Electric car maker Tesla Motors Inc  said it was looking to raise about $642.5 million through a share sale  above the $500 million it announced on Thursday.
